data.title: James Newton Howard: Movies, Photos, Videos, News, Biography & Birthday
data.meta_description: James Newton Howard: Check out the list of all James Newton Howard movies along with photos, videos, biography and birthday. Also find latest James Newton Howard news on Times of India.
data.text:
James Cameron, Kathleen Kennedy and others urges Academy to restore original Oscars format

PTI / Mar 10, 2022, 19:17 (IST)

A host of high profile Hollywood personalities, including filmmaker James Cameron, producer Kathleen Kennedy and composer John Williams, have urged the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences (AMPAS) to undo the recently announced changes to the Oscars format. The Academy last month had announced changes to the annual award ceremony when it revealed that winners for eight categories will be presented off air during the 2022 Oscars, a move that received instant backlash from the artistic community and the public.

'The Hunger Games in Concert' tour to launch from July 12

PTI / Apr 12, 2018, 23:57 (IST)

The makers have announced that it will kick off the international tour of 'The Hunger Games in Concert' from July 12 in Manchester, UK.

Oscar Nominations 2021: Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas announce the complete list of nominees

TIMESOFINDIA.COM / Mar 15, 2021, 18:26 (IST)

Priyanka Chopra Jonas and husband Nick Jonas have announced the nominees for the 93rd Academy Awards. The main event is going to be held on April 25 GMT will be an in-person event. Here are the complete list of nominees.

Critics Choice Awards 2021: 'Mank', 'Da 5 Bloods', 'Ma Rainey's Black Bottom' and 'The Trial of the Chicago 7' lead nominations

ANI / Feb 09, 2021, 16:06 (IST)

With just a month left for the 26th Critics Choice Awards (CCA) to honour the finest achievements in film and television, the nominations' list is finally out. The nominees' list saw the 2020 drama-comedy 'Mank' bagging 12 nominations for all main categories followed by 'Da 5 Bloods', 'Ma Rainey's Black Bottom' and 'The Trial of the Chicago 7' for the platform.

Meet Indian-American violinist, Gingger Shankar

TNN / May 22, 2015, 00:00 (IST)

This singer and virtuoso violinist most recently guested on Katy Perryâ€™s album Prism on the single Legendary Lover. The eldest daughter of violinist L. Subramaniam and grandniece of sitarist Ravi Shankar, she has worked with international producers and film composers including Mel Gibson, The Smashing Pumpkins, Trent Reznor, Mike Nichols, Mike Myers and James Newton Howard.

Knights of honour

TNN / Feb 09, 2009, 00:38 (IST)

As the world gets ready to tune in to the 81st Annual Academy Awards on February 22, PT takes a look at films that are likely to hit the jackpot this year. And, of course, it wonders whether Slumdog Millionaire would get composer A R Rahman the much-coveted Golden Knight.
